title: Cashier Information (request)
description: Request the cashier info for the specified type.

cashier.description: Operation which needs to be requested from cashier

address.description: [Optional] Address for crypto withdrawal. Only applicable for `api` type.

amount.description: [Optional] Amount for crypto withdrawal. Only applicable for `api` type.

dry_run.description: [Optional] If set to `1`, only validation is performed. Only applicable for `withdraw` using `crypto` provider and `api` type.

provider.description: [Optional] Cashier provider. `crypto` will be default option for crypto currency accounts.

type.description: [Optional] Data need to be returned from cashier. `api` is supported only for `crypto` provider.

verification_code.description: [Optional] Email verification code (received from a `verify_email` call, which must be done first)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
